definitions.definition: Drawings or words drawn on a surface in a public place, usually made without authorization .
examples: The underpass is a popular place for graffiti artists.
The city council spends thousands of pounds removing graffiti from public buildings.

definitions.definition: Informal inscriptions , figure drawings, etc., as opposed to official inscriptions.

main_definition: ( chiefly uncountable ) Drawings or words drawn on a surface in a public place, usually made without authorization .
secondary_definitions: ( archaeology , countable ) Informal inscriptions , figure drawings, etc., as opposed to official inscriptions.
